function.name: xmlrpc_decode_request
function.description: Decodes XML into native PHP types.

function.name: xmlrpc_decode
function.description: Decodes XML into native PHP types.

function.name: xmlrpc_encode
function.description: Generates XML for a PHP value.

function.name: xmlrpc_server_register_method
function.description: Register a PHP function to handle method matching method_name.

function.name: xmlrpc_parse_method_descriptions
function.description: Decodes XML into a list of method descriptions.

function.name: xmlrpc_server_call_method
function.description: Parses XML requests and call methods.

function.name: xmlrpc_get_type
function.description: Gets xmlrpc type for a PHP value. Especially useful for base64 and datetime strings.

function.name: xmlrpc_set_type
function.description: Sets xmlrpc type, base64 or datetime, for a PHP string value.

function.name: xmlrpc_server_register_introspection_callback
function.description: Register a PHP function to generate documentation.

function.name: xmlrpc_encode_request
function.description: Generates XML for a method request.

function.name: xmlrpc_is_fault
function.description: Determines if an array value represents an XMLRPC fault.
